title: I got a penaltie for 5 games (20 min) without reason
body: I got a penaltie for 5 matchmade games, each of 20 minutes. I had a problem with League which crashed when a game was loading, and thats why I got the peneltie. I think i don't deserve this because it was not my fault League crashed, and I think it should be removed. (because it was not my fault). I hope Riot understands this because waiting 20 minutes for a game just ruines it for me.

replies.body: Just as a piece of advice, if you notice you are having connection issues, you should stop queuing up for games and work on getting those issues resolves before re-queuing

The [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) system will treat all leaves the same even if it is not intentional, because they all cause others negative experiences.   The only way to remove the timer is by completing the required games, so let me know where exactly you're crashing and any errors you are receiving, and I'd be happy to help.  Let me know!
